div.p: REEF a term in ∙ navigation, when there is a great gale of wind, they commonly roll up part of the ſail below, that by this means -it may become the narrower, and not draw ſo much wind 5 which contract- ■ ing or taking up the fail they call a reef, or reefing the fail : ſo alſo when ,a top-mafi is fprung, as they call it, that is, when it is cracked^ or almoſt broken in the cap·, they cut off the.lower piece that was near broken off, and ſetting the other part, now much ſhorter,- in the ſtep again, they call it a reefed top-mafi.
